sqlMap.select:
SELECT BB.DPOB_CD , BB.SYSTEMKEY , BB.HAN_NM , AA.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , (SELECT PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM FROM BASS0150 WHERE BASS0150.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD = AA.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD) AS PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM , BB.ENG_NM , BB.CHIN_CHAR_NM , BB.RESN_REGN_NUM , BB.SX_DIV_CD , BB.YOOBH_MNTH_DAY , BB.SCLC_DIV_CD , BB.NATN_CD , BB.DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.DEPT_CD,'2') AS DEPT_NM , BB.BUSIN_CD , BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD,'2') AS CURR_AFFN_DEPT_NM , BB.REPBTY_BUSIN_DIV_CD , BB.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , BB.ODTY_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.ODTY_CD) AS ODTY_NM , BB.FRST_EMYMT_DT , BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD) AS EMYMT_DIV_NM , BB.EMYMT_BGNN_DT , BB.EMYMT_END_DT , BB.PYSP_CD , BB.PERN_NOTE_CTNT , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.PYSP_CD) AS PYSP_NM , BB.HDOFC_CODTN_CD , ( SELECT MAX(RETRY_DT) AS RKFCD_DT FROM (SELECT DPOB_CD, SYSTEMKEY, CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD , RETRY_DT FROM REMT2000 UNION ALL SELECT DPOB_CD, SYSTEMKEY , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD, RSGTN_DT FROM REMT9000) WHERE DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD = 'B0270010' ) AS RKFCD_DT
, BB.RETRY_DT , BB.RETRY_REAS_CTNT , BB.FRGNR_DIV_CD , BB.PSPT_NUM , BB.STY_BGNN_DT , BB.STY_END_DT , BB.END_SCHL , BB.END_DEGR_DIV_CD , BB.PMTN_SCDU_DT , BB.PYSP_PRMTN_SCDU_DT , BB.REYMN_SCDU_DT , BB.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD) AS LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_NM , BB.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD , (SELECT COMM_CD_NM FROM BASS0300 C WHERE C.COMM_CD = LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD) ||' '||(SELECT COMM_CD_NM FROM BASS0300 C WHERE C.COMM_CD = LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD) AS LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_NM , BB.CURR_PYSP_APPMT_DT , BB.CURR_DEPT_APPMT_DT , BB.PERN_NOTE_CTNT , (SELECT MAX (B.CURR_PAE_WORK_NM) FROM PSNL0110 B WHERE B.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND B.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY) AS CURR_PAE_WORK_NM , BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD) AS PYSP_GRDE_NM , BB.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1' ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM , '('||(SELECT BUSIN_APPTN_YR FROM BASS0500 WHERE BB.DPOB_CD = DPOB_CD AND BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD = DEPT_CD AND BB.BUSIN_CD = BUSIN_CD AND SUBSTR(BB.EMYMT_BGNN_DT,1,4) = BUSIN_APPTN_YR)||')'|| (SELECT BUSIN_NM FROM BASS0500 WHERE BB.DPOB_CD = DPOB_CD AND BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD = DEPT_CD AND BB.BUSIN_CD = BUSIN_CD AND SUBSTR(BB.EMYMT_BGNN_DT,1,4) = BUSIN_APPTN_YR) AS BUSIN_NM , EE.BNK_CD , EE.BNK_ACCU_NUM , EE.ACNT_HODR_NM , EE.RPSTTV_ACCU_YN , NVL(( SELECT (CASE WHEN SEVE_PAY_ADD_RATE_FRM_CD = 'R0010010' THEN TO_NUMBER(SEVE_PAY_ADD_RATE) WHEN SEVE_PAY_ADD_RATE_FRM_CD = 'R0010020' THEN 0 WHEN SEVE_PAY_ADD_RATE_FRM_CD = 'R0010030' THEN CASE WHEN SEVE_PAY_ADD_SUM > 0 THEN 0 ELSE TO_NUMBER(SEVE_PAY_ADD_RATE) END ELSE 0 END) AS SEVE_PAY_ADD_RATE FROM REMT1000 WHERE DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND TYP_OCCU_CD = BB.TYP_OCCU_CD AND DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD AND SEVE_PAY_ADD_USE_YN = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN SEVE_PAY_ADD_BGNN_DT AND SEVE_PAY_ADD_END_DT AND DECODE(SEVE_PAY_ADD_RATE_FRM_CD,'R0010030',0, fcBass0300ITEMNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD,1)) BETWEEN SEVE_PAY_ADD_OVR AND SEVE_PAY_ADD_UDR ),0) AS SEVE_PAY_ADD_RATE , NVL(( SELECT (CASE WHEN SEVE_PAY_ADD_RATE_FRM_CD = 'R0010010' THEN 0 WHEN SEVE_PAY_ADD_RATE_FRM_CD = 'R0010020' THEN SEVE_PAY_ADD_SUM WHEN SEVE_PAY_ADD_RATE_FRM_CD = 'R0010030' THEN CASE WHEN SEVE_PAY_ADD_SUM > 0 THEN SEVE_PAY_ADD_SUM ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END) AS SEVE_PAY_ADD_SUM FROM REMT1000 WHERE DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND TYP_OCCU_CD = BB.TYP_OCCU_CD AND DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD AND SEVE_PAY_ADD_USE_YN = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN SEVE_PAY_ADD_BGNN_DT AND SEVE_PAY_ADD_END_DT AND DECODE(SEVE_PAY_ADD_RATE_FRM_CD,'R0010030',0, fcBass0300ITEMNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD,1)) BETWEEN SEVE_PAY_ADD_OVR AND SEVE_PAY_ADD_UDR ),0) AS SEVE_PAY_ADD_SUM
,NVL((SELECT (CASE WHEN NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN NVL(AMCRR_CLUT_INSN_YN,'N') = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS CHK_AMCRR_CLUT_INSN_YN FROM (SELECT DPOB_CD, SYSTEMKEY, CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD , AMCRR_CLUT_INSN_YN FROM REMT2000 UNION ALL SELECT DPOB_CD, SYSTEMKEY , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD, AMCRR_CLUT_INSN_YN FROM REMT9000) WHERE DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD = 'B0270010'),'N') AS CHK_AMCRR_CLUT_INSN_YN
,NVL((SELECT (CASE WHEN NVL(SERVC_RCGTN_PRID_CD,'A0290000') <> 'A0290000' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS AMCRR_CLUT_INSN_YN FROM PSNL0112 WHERE DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY ),'N') AMCRR_CLUT_INSN_YN
FROM PAYR0500 AA, PSNL0100 BB , ( SELECT SYSTEMKEY , DPOB_CD , PAY_CD , BNK_CD , BNK_ACCU_NUM , ACNT_HODR_NM , RPSTTV_ACCU_YN FROM PSNL0130 WHERE (SYSTEMKEY , DPOB_CD , PAY_CD ) IN ( SELECT SYSTEMKEY , DPOB_CD , NVL((SELECT PAY_CD FROM PSNL0130 BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.PAY_CD = 'B0150000' AND BB.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY ),'B0150000') FROM PSNL0130 AA WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd#) ) EE WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY= BB.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD = EE.DPOB_CD(+) AND AA.SYSTEMKEY= EE.SYSTEMKEY(+) AND AA.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#

SELECT AA.DPOB_CD ,AA.SYSTEMKEY ,AA.LOG_SVC_YR_NUM ,AA.LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM ,AA.LOG_SVC_NUM_DYS ,AA.TURTY_DUTY_YR_NUM ,AA.TURTY_DUTY_MNTH_NUM ,AA.TURTY_DUTY_NUM_DYS ,AA.TOT_LOG_SVC_NUM_DYS ,NVL(BB.AMCRR_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM,0) AS AMCRR_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM ,NVL(BB.AMCRR_LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM,0) AS AMCRR_LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM ,NVL(BB.AMCRR_LOG_SVC_NUM_DYS,0) AS AMCRR_LOG_SVC_NUM_DYS ,AA.PAY_CMPTTN_BGNN_DT , AA.PAY_CMPTTN_END_DT FROM (SELECT (#dpobCd#) AS DPOB_CD, (#systemkey#) AS SYSTEMKEY , TRUNC((MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(#retryDt#,'YYYYMMDD') , TO_DATE(#rkfcdDt#,'YYYYMMDD'))/12),0) AS LOG_SVC_YR_NUM , TRUNC(MOD((MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(#retryDt#,'YYYYMMDD') , TO_DATE(#rkfcdDt#,'YYYYMMDD'))),12),0) AS LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM , TRUNC(((MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(#retryDt#,'YYYYMMDD') , TO_DATE(#rkfcdDt#,'YYYYMMDD')) - TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(#retryDt#,'YYYYMMDD') , TO_DATE(#rkfcdDt#,'YYYYMMDD')),0) ) * 30.5),0) AS LOG_SVC_NUM_DYS, ( CASE WHEN TRUNC(MOD((MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(#retryDt#,'YYYYMMDD') , TO_DATE(#rkfcdDt#,'YYYYMMDD'))),12),0) > 0 THEN TRUNC((MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(#retryDt#,'YYYYMMDD') , TO_DATE(#rkfcdDt#,'YYYYMMDD'))/12),0) + 1 ELSE TRUNC((MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(#retryDt#,'YYYYMMDD') , TO_DATE(#rkfcdDt#,'YYYYMMDD'))/12),0) END ) AS TURTY_DUTY_YR_NUM, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(#retryDt#,'YYYYMMDD'), TO_DATE(#rkfcdDt#,'YYYYMMDD')),0) AS TURTY_DUTY_MNTH_NUM , (TO_DATE(#retryDt#,'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(#rkfcdDt#,'YYYYMMDD')) AS TURTY_DUTY_NUM_DYS, (TO_DATE(#retryDt#,'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(#rkfcdDt#,'YYYYMMDD')) AS TOT_LOG_SVC_NUM_DYS, TO_CHAR(((ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE( #retryDt#, 'YYYYMMDD' ),-3) )),'YYYYMMDD') AS PAY_CMPTTN_BGNN_DT, (#retryDt#) AS PAY_CMPTTN_END_DT FROM DUAL) AA, ( SELECT DPOB_CD, SYSTEMKEY, NVL(TRUNC((least(MONTH_DAYS, MANGE_MONTH_DAYS )/12), 0), 0) AS AMCRR_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM , NVL(TRUNC(least( NVL(MONTH_DAYS,0),NVL(MANGE_MONTH_DAYS,0)), 0), 0) AS AMCRR_LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM, (CASE WHEN NVL(TRUNC(least( NVL(MONTH_DAYS,0),NVL(MANGE_MONTH_DAYS,0)), 0), 0) = NVL(MONTH_DAYS,0) THEN (CASE WHEN NVL(ENRLNT_DT,'TT') <> 'TT' AND NVL(DSAGE_DT,'TT') <> 'TT' AND LENGTH(ENRLNT_DT) = 8 AND LENGTH(DSAGE_DT) = 8 THEN ((TO_DATE(DSAGE_DT,'YYYYMMDD')) - TO_DATE(ENRLNT_DT,'YYYYMMDD')) ELSE 0 END) ELSE 0 END) AS AMCRR_LOG_SVC_NUM_DYS FROM (SELECT DPOB_CD, SYSTEMKEY,ENRLNT_DT,DSAGE_DT , (CASE WHEN NVL(ENRLNT_DT,'TT') <> 'TT' AND NVL(DSAGE_DT,'TT') <> 'TT' AND LENGTH(ENRLNT_DT) = 8 AND LENGTH(DSAGE_DT) = 8 THEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(DSAGE_DT,'YYYYMMDD') , TO_DATE(ENRLNT_DT,'YYYYMMDD')),0) ELSE 0 END) AS MONTH_DAYS, (SELECT NVL(MANGE_ITEM11,0) FROM BASS0300 GG WHERE GG.DPOB_CD = NN.DPOB_CD AND GG.COMM_CD = NN.SERVC_RCGTN_PRID_CD ) AS MANGE_MONTH_DAYS FROM PSNL0112 NN WHERE NVL(NN.SERVC_RCGTN_PRID_CD,'A0290000') NOT IN ('A0290000')) ) BB, (SELECT DPOB_CD, SYSTEMKEY , SUM(NVL(RCGTN_MNTH_NUM,0)) AS RCGTN_MNTH_NUM FROM PSNL0119 GROUP BY DPOB_CD, SYSTEMKEY ) CC, ( SELECT DPOB_CD, SYSTEMKEY, (TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_DATE(MIN_EMYMT_BGNN_DT,'YYYYMMDD') + 1, TO_DATE(EMYMT_BGNN_DT,'YYYYMMDD')),0) ) AS MONTH_RETY_DAY0110 FROM (SELECT AA.DPOB_CD, AA.SYSTEMKEY, BB.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, MIN(CASE WHEN BB.EMYMT_BGNN_DT < AA.EMYMT_BGNN_DT THEN AA.EMYMT_BGNN_DT ELSE NULL END) AS MIN_EMYMT_BGNN_DT FROM PSNL0110 AA , (SELECT * FROM PSNL0110 WHERE EMYMT_TYP_CD IN ('A0420990') ) BB WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.EMYMT_TYP_CD IN ('A0420010','A0420020','A0420060') GROUP BY AA.DPOB_CD, AA.SYSTEMKEY,BB.EMYMT_BGNN_DT) WHERE MIN_EMYMT_BGNN_DT IS NOT NULL ) DD WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD(+) AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY(+) AND AA.DPOB_CD = CC.DPOB_CD(+) AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = CC.SYSTEMKEY(+) AND AA.DPOB_CD = DD.DPOB_CD(+) AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = DD.SYSTEMKEY(+) AND AA.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#

SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.PAY_YR , AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , AA.PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM , AA.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , AA.TYP_OCCU_CD , AA.PAYR_IMCD , AA.PAY_CD , AA.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , AA.ITEM_NM , AA.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , AA.PYMT_DDUC_FRM_CD , AA.PYMT_DDUC_RATE , NVL(AA.PYMT_DDUC_SUM,0) AS PYMT_DDUC_SUM , AA.TXTN_DIV_CD , AA.FREE_DTY_RATE , AA.FREE_DTY_SUM , AA.JAN , AA.FEB , AA.MAR , AA.APR , AA.MAY , AA.JUN , AA.JUL , AA.AUG , AA.SEP , AA.OCT , AA.NOV , AA.DEC , AA.RNGE_ORD , AA.PAY_ITEM_USE_YN , AA.ITEM_APPTN_BGNN_DT , AA.ITEM_APPTN_END_DT , AA.DAY_MNTH_AMNT_DIV_CD , AA.CALC_STD_DIV_CD , AA.EMYMT_DIV_CD , AA.USALY_AMNT_YN , AA.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , AA.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD , NVL(AA.UCST_SUM,0) AS UCST_SUM , AA.UCST_CALC_DIV_CD , AA.UCST_PRNT_ORD , AA.UCST_DGM_BGNN_DT , AA.UCST_DGM_END_DT , AA.UCST_DGM_USE_YN , DD.MNTH_USALY_AMNT_WAG , DD.MNTH_USALY_AMNT_ALLW_BNUS_SUM , DD.USALY_AMNT_PDY_QNTY , DD.USALY_AMNT_HRWG_QNTY , AA.CALC_STD_FUNC FROM ( SELECT XX.DPOB_CD , XX.PAY_YR , XX.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , XX.PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM , XX.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , XX.PAY_CD , XX.PAYR_IMCD , XX.ITEM_NM , XX.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD , XX.PYMT_DDUC_FRM_CD , XX.PYMT_DDUC_RATE , NVL(XX.PYMT_DDUC_SUM,0) AS PYMT_DDUC_SUM , XX.TXTN_DIV_CD , XX.FREE_DTY_RATE , XX.FREE_DTY_SUM , XX.JAN , XX.FEB , XX.MAR , XX.APR , XX.MAY , XX.JUN , XX.JUL , XX.AUG , XX.SEP , XX.OCT , XX.NOV , XX.DEC , XX.RNGE_ORD , XX.PAY_ITEM_USE_YN , XX.ITEM_APPTN_BGNN_DT , XX.ITEM_APPTN_END_DT , XX.DAY_MNTH_AMNT_DIV_CD , XX.CALC_STD_DIV_CD , XX.EMYMT_DIV_CD , XX.USALY_AMNT_YN , XX.CALC_STD_FUNC , BB.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , BB.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD , BB.UCST_SUM , BB.UCST_CALC_DIV_CD , BB.UCST_PRNT_ORD , BB.UCST_DGM_BGNN_DT , BB.UCST_DGM_END_DT , BB.UCST_DGM_USE_YN , CC.TYP_OCCU_CD , CC.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD FROM PAYR0410 XX, ( SELECT KK.* FROM PAYR0440 KK, ( SELECT NN.DPOB_CD , NN.PAY_YR , NN.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , NN.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD , OO.TYP_OCCU_CD , OO.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , (CASE WHEN NN.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM > OO.MANGE_ITEM01 THEN OO.COMM_CD ELSE NN.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD END) AS PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , PAY_YR , TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD , MAX(PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD) AS PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , MAX(TO_NUMBER(PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM)) AS PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM FROM (SELECT DPOB_CD , PAY_YR , TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD , (SELECT COMM_CD FROM BASS0300 WHERE RPSTTV_CD = 'A007' AND COMM_CD = PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD ) AS PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , (SELECT MANGE_ITEM01 FROM BASS0300 WHERE RPSTTV_CD = 'A007' AND COMM_CD = PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD ) AS PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM FROM PAYR0440 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PAY_YR=SUBSTR(REPLACE(#retryDt#,'.',''),1,4) AND REPLACE(#retryDt#,'.','') BETWEEN UCST_DGM_BGNN_DT AND UCST_DGM_END_DT ) GROUP BY DPOB_CD , PAY_YR , TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD ) NN, ( SELECT QQ.DPOB_CD , QQ.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , QQ.TYP_OCCU_CD , QQ.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , PP.COMM_CD , TO_NUMBER(PP.MANGE_ITEM01) AS MANGE_ITEM01 FROM BASS0300 PP , PAYR0400 QQ WHERE PP.DPOB_CD = QQ.DPOB_CD AND PP.RPSTTV_CD = 'A007'
PP.COMM_CD
#logSvcYrNumCdArr[]#
AND QQ.TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd# AND QQ.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD=#dtilOccuInttnCd# ) OO WHERE NN.DPOB_CD = OO.DPOB_CD AND NN.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = OO.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM ) CC WHERE KK.DPOB_CD = CC.DPOB_CD AND KK.PAY_YR = CC.PAY_YR AND KK.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM= CC.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM AND KK.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD= CC.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD AND KK.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD = CC.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD ) BB , (SELECT QQ.DPOB_CD , QQ.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , QQ.TYP_OCCU_CD , QQ.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , PP.COMM_CD , TO_NUMBER(PP.MANGE_ITEM01) AS MANGE_ITEM01 FROM BASS0300 PP , PAYR0400 QQ WHERE PP.DPOB_CD = QQ.DPOB_CD AND PP.RPSTTV_CD = 'A007'
PP.COMM_CD
#logSvcYrNumCdArr[]#
AND QQ.TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd# AND QQ.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD=#dtilOccuInttnCd# ) CC WHERE XX.PAY_ITEM_USE_YN = 'Y' AND XX.DPOB_CD = CC.DPOB_CD AND XX.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = CC.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM AND XX.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM=BB.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM(+) AND XX.PAYR_IMCD=BB.PAYR_ITEM_CD(+) AND XX.PAY_YR = BB.PAY_YR(+) AND BB.UCST_DGM_USE_YN(+) = 'Y' AND XX.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND XX.PAY_YR=SUBSTR(REPLACE(#retryDt#,'.',''),1,4) AND REPLACE(#retryDt#,'.','') BETWEEN BB.UCST_DGM_BGNN_DT AND BB.UCST_DGM_END_DT AND XX.PAY_CD='B0150000' ) AA, PAYR0445 DD WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = DD.DPOB_CD(+) AND AA.PAY_YR = DD.PAY_YR(+) AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM= DD.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM(+) AND AA.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD= DD.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD(+) AND AA.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD = DD.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD(+)

SELECT AA.DPOB_CD, AA.SYSTEMKEY, AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH , AA.RESN_REGN_NUM, NVL( FF.DILNLAZ_DUTY_NUM_DYS,0) AS DILNLAZ_DUTY_NUM_DYS, SUM( FF.DILNLAZ_LVSG_NUM_DYS) AS DILNLAZ_LVSG_NUM_DYS, SUM( FF.DILNLAZ_ABNCE_NUM_DYS) AS DILNLAZ_ABNCE_NUM_DYS, SUM( FF.DILNLAZ_SCKLEA_NUM_DYS) AS DILNLAZ_SCKLEA_NUM_DYS, SUM( FF.DILNLAZ_OFFVA_NUM_DYS) AS DILNLAZ_OFFVA_NUM_DYS, SUM( FF.DILNLAZ_FMLY_EVNT_NUM_DYS) AS DILNLAZ_FMLY_EVNT_NUM_DYS, SUM( FF.DILNLAZ_HLTH_CRE_NUM_DYS) AS DILNLAZ_HLTH_CRE_NUM_DYS, SUM( HH.DILNLAZ_WKLY_HLDY_NUM_DYS) AS DILNLAZ_WKLY_HLDY_NUM_DYS, SUM( HH.DILNLAZ_PAID_PUBC_HODY_NUM) AS DILNLAZ_PAID_PUBC_HODY_NUM,
SUM( FF.DILNLAZ_ABNCE_DUTY_RCGTN_DYS) AS DILNLAZ_ABNCE_DUTY_RCGTN_DYS, SUM( FF.DILNLAZ_SPCL_HODY_NUM_DYS) AS DILNLAZ_SPCL_HODY_NUM_DYS , SUM( HH.DILNLAZ_PAID_HODY_NUM_DYS) AS DILNLAZ_PAID_HODY_NUM_DYS, SUM( HH.DILNLAZ_TFC_ASS_CST_NUM_DYS) AS DILNLAZ_TFC_ASS_CST_NUM_DYS,
SUM( NVL(GG.DILNLAZ_SAT_DUTY_NUM_DYS,0)) AS DILNLAZ_SAT_DUTY_NUM_DYS , SUM( NVL(GG.DILNLAZ_PUBC_HODY_DUTY_NUM_DYS,0)) AS DILNLAZ_PUBC_HODY_DUTY_NUM_DYS,
SUM( NVL(GG.DILNLAZ_TOT_NTOT_NUM_DYS,0)) AS DILNLAZ_TOT_NTOT_NUM_DYS, SUM( NVL(GG.DILNLAZ_TOT_NTOT_TM,0)) AS DILNLAZ_TOT_NTOT_TM, SUM( NVL(GG.DILNLAZ_FNDTN_TM_RST_DUTY_TM,0)) AS DILNLAZ_FNDTN_TM_RST_DUTY_TM, SUM( NVL(GG.DILNLAZ_TM_RST_DUTY_TM,0)) AS DILNLAZ_TM_RST_DUTY_TM, SUM( NVL(GG.DILNLAZ_TOT_TM_RST_DUTY_TM,0)) AS DILNLAZ_TOT_TM_RST_DUTY_TM FROM PAYR0304 AA, DLGN0100 FF, DLGN0200 GG, ( SELECT DPOB_CD, SYSTEMKEY, DILNLAZ_YR_MNTH, DILNLAZ_DUTY_NUM_DYS, DILNLAZ_LVSG_NUM_DYS, DILNLAZ_ABNCE_NUM_DYS, DILNLAZ_SCKLEA_NUM_DYS, DILNLAZ_OFFVA_NUM_DYS, DILNLAZ_FMLY_EVNT_NUM_DYS, DILNLAZ_HLTH_CRE_NUM_DYS, DILNLAZ_WKLY_HLDY_NUM_DYS, DILNLAZ_PAID_PUBC_HODY_NUM, DILNLAZ_SAT_DUTY_NUM_DYS, DILNLAZ_PUBC_HODY_DUTY_NUM_DYS, DILNLAZ_ABNCE_DUTY_RCGTN_DYS, DILNLAZ_SPCL_HODY_NUM_DYS, DILNLAZ_PAID_HODY_NUM_DYS, DILNLAZ_TFC_ASS_CST_NUM_DYS FROM DLGN0100 WHERE DILNLAZ_YR_MNTH BETWEEN TO_CHAR((ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE((#payPymtBgnnDt#),'YYYYMMDD') , 1)),'YYYYMM') AND TO_CHAR((ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE((#payPymtEndDt#),'YYYYMMDD') , 1)),'YYYYMM') ) HH WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = FF.DPOB_CD AND AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH = FF.DILNLAZ_YR_MNTH AND AA.SYSTEMKEY= FF.SYSTEMKEY AND FF.DILNLAZ_YR_MNTH BETWEEN SUBSTR(#payPymtBgnnDt#,1,6) AND SUBSTR(#payPymtEndDt#,1,6) AND AA.DPOB_CD = HH.DPOB_CD(+) AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = HH.SYSTEMKEY(+) AND AA.DPOB_CD = GG.DPOB_CD(+) AND AA.SYSTEMKEY= GG.SYSTEMKEY(+) AND GG.DILNLAZ_EXCE_DUTY_YR_MNTH(+) BETWEEN TO_CHAR((ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE((#payPymtBgnnDt#),'YYYYMMDD') , 1)),'YYYYMM') AND TO_CHAR((ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE((#payPymtEndDt#),'YYYYMMDD') , 1)),'YYYYMM') AND AA.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH BETWEEN SUBSTR(#payPymtBgnnDt#,1,6) AND SUBSTR(#payPymtEndDt#,1,6) GROUP BY AA.DPOB_CD, AA.SYSTEMKEY, AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH , AA.RESN_REGN_NUM , NVL(FF.DILNLAZ_DUTY_NUM_DYS,0)

SELECT OO.DPOB_CD , OO.PAY_EXTPY_CD AS PAY_ITEM_CD ,NVL(NN.SYSTEMKEY, #systemkey# ) AS SYSTEMKEY ,NVL(NN.PYMT_DDUC_SUM,0) AS PYMT_DDUC_SUM FROM (SELECT DPOB_CD, PAY_EXTPY_CD FROM PAYR0480 WHERE SEVE_PAY_GRP_CD IN ('R0020010')) OO, (SELECT DD.DPOB_CD ,DD.SYSTEMKEY ,DD.PAY_ITEM_CD ,SUM(NVL(DD.PYMT_DDUC_SUM,0)) AS PYMT_DDUC_SUM FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT AA.DPOB_CD ,AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH ,AA.SYSTEMKEY ,BB.PAY_ITEM_CD ,BB.PYMT_DDUC_SUM FROM PAYR0304 AA, PAYR0302 BB WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.PAY_CD = BB.PAY_CD AND AA.PAYR_SEIL_NUM = BB.PAYR_SEIL_NUM AND BB.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD IN ('B0080010','B0080020') AND BB.PAY_ITEM_CD IN (SELECT PAY_EXTPY_CD FROM PAYR0480 WHERE SEVE_PAY_GRP_CD IN ('R0020010')) AND AA.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH BETWEEN SUBSTR(#payPymtBgnnDt#,1,6) AND SUBSTR(#payPymtEndDt#,1,6) UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT AA.DPOB_CD ,AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH ,AA.SYSTEMKEY ,BB.PAY_ITEM_CD ,BB.PYMT_DDUC_SUM FROM PAYR0304 AA, PAYR0302 BB WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.PAY_CD = BB.PAY_CD AND AA.PAYR_SEIL_NUM = BB.PAYR_SEIL_NUM AND BB.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD IN ('B0080010','B0080020') AND BB.PAY_ITEM_CD IN (SELECT PAY_EXTPY_CD FROM PAYR0480 WHERE SEVE_PAY_GRP_CD IN ('R0020010')) AND AA.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH BETWEEN TO_CHAR((ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE((#payPymtBgnnDt#),'YYYYMMDD') , 1)),'YYYYMM') AND TO_CHAR((ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE((#payPymtEndDt#),'YYYYMMDD') , 1)),'YYYYMM') ) DD GROUP BY DD.DPOB_CD ,DD.SYSTEMKEY ,DD.PAY_ITEM_CD) NN WHERE OO.DPOB_CD = NN.DPOB_CD(+) AND OO.PAY_EXTPY_CD = NN.PAY_ITEM_CD(+) ORDER BY OO.DPOB_CD ASC ,OO.PAY_EXTPY_CD ASC

SELECT ZZ01.DPOB_CD , ZZ02.SYSTEMKEY ,ZZ01.PAY_ITEM_CD ,ZZ01.PAY_ITEM_NM ,ZZ01.ITEM_MONTHS ,NVL(ZZ02.PYMT_DDUC_SUM,0) AS PYMT_SUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , PAY_EXTPY_CD AS PAY_ITEM_CD ,PAY_EXTPY_NM AS PAY_ITEM_NM , (CASE WHEN PAY_EXTPY_CD = 'C9050100' THEN '12' WHEN PAY_EXTPY_CD = 'C9110100' THEN '2' WHEN PAY_EXTPY_CD = 'C9410600' THEN '12' ELSE '' END ) AS ITEM_MONTHS FROM PAYR0480 WHERE SEVE_PAY_GRP_CD IN ('R0020020') ) ZZ01, (SELECT AA.DPOB_CD ,AA.SYSTEMKEY ,BB.PAY_ITEM_CD ,SUM(BB.PYMT_DDUC_SUM) AS PYMT_DDUC_SUM FROM PAYR0304 AA, PAYR0302 BB, ( SELECT FST_DATE, ED_DATE FROM (SELECT MIN(DAY) AS FST_DATE, MAX(DAY) AS ED_DATE FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR((ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE( #retryDt#, 'YYYYMMDD' ) - 1 ,-12)) + LEVEL, 'YYYYMMDD' ) AS DAY FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <=( TO_DATE( #retryDt#, 'YYYYMMDD' ) - (ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE( #retryDt#, 'YYYYMMDD' ),-12)))) GROUP BY SUBSTR(DAY,1,6)) ) CC WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH = BB.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.PAY_CD = BB.PAY_CD AND AA.PAYR_SEIL_NUM = BB.PAYR_SEIL_NUM AND BB.PYMT_DDUC_DIV_CD IN ('B0080010','B0080020') AND BB.PAY_ITEM_CD IN (SELECT PAY_EXTPY_CD FROM PAYR0480 WHERE SEVE_PAY_GRP_CD IN ('R0020020')) AND AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH BETWEEN SUBSTR(CC.FST_DATE,1,6) AND SUBSTR(CC.ED_DATE,1,6) AND AA.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# GROUP BY AA.DPOB_CD ,AA.SYSTEMKEY ,BB.PAY_ITEM_CD ) ZZ02 WHERE ZZ01.DPOB_CD = ZZ02.DPOB_CD(+) AND ZZ01.PAY_ITEM_CD = ZZ02.PAY_ITEM_CD(+)
